data: David Lee is a VC Investor and Co-founder at FutureVentures with 12 years of experience in venture capital.
David Lee co-founded FutureVentures in 2015 after a successful exit of his first startup.
David Lee has raised $150M across two funds.
David Lee has invested in more than 50 companies and mentored over 100 founders.
David Leeâ€™s portfolio includes more than 20 seed investments in SaaS startups across North America.
David Lee met contacts at the World Economic Forum in Davos.
David Lee is based in Seattle, Washington, US.
David Lee has expertise in Deal Sourcing, Due Diligence, and Portfolio Management.
